project_name: IPFS及Filecoin价值资讯传递（南山居士Hill）
description:
Description of your project
An industry news and education platform focusing on IPFS and Filecoin, covering nearly 160,000 users in IPFS and Filecoin China and Chinese communities. It makes full use of major domestic and foreign media to convey the voices of IPFS and Filecoin officials and communities around the world as objectively as possible, including but not limited to development trends, ecological construction, etc.
additional_impact:
Our team is led by Nanshan Jushi Hill, who has been involved in the stock market since 2002. He experienced two bull and bear cycles, from 2005 to 2006 and from 2014 to 2015, and has come to appreciate the immense appeal of the capital market.

In 2013, he co-founded an investment management company, which covers securities, precious metals spot trading, agricultural products, and cultural and art products. During this time, he served as a trainer and instructor in precious metals at China Postal Savings Bank. He maintains his own social media accounts on Weibo and a blog, and has launched the official account "Nanshan Jushi Leading Stocks."

In 2019, he discovered IPFS and Filecoin and continued to learn about the crypto industry. To disseminate relevant information more objectively and quickly, he created the official account "IPFS and Filecoin Value Information Delivery" and produces short video content for platforms such as YouTube, Kuaishou, and Toutiao. To date, he has accumulated approximately 150,000 followers. He witnessed the bull and bear cycles from 2020 to 2022, as well as the development of Filecoin. He felt the power of crypto industry cycles and realized that aligning with these cycles to make informed investments is the key to wealth.
end_user:
Contributions: November 2024 to September 2025: Over 950 articles and 85 videos about Filecoin, with over 1 million total views; sold over 20 PiB of Filecoin storage computing power.

testimonials:
On September 14, 2023, he became an official Orbit Ambassador for Filecoin.

From the beginning of 2021 to the present, he has been actively collaborating with NEW WEB GROUP (NWG), Orbit's Greater China coordinator, and actively participating in and promoting Filecoin's ecosystem projects, including Titan Network, making significant contributions to the Filecoin ecosystem.

As a result, in the first round of Filecoin ProPGF applications, our project's recommender was NEW WEB GROUP (NWG). We have now received Filecoin ProPGF funding twice in a row.

FIL-RetroPGF：
Round 1:https://www.fil-retropgf.io/projects/0x1995fc8da5b940c5e75cce7d7a8626c6bd3ad5175efc27d19899187caed8d67b

Round 2:https://www.fil-retropgf.io/projects/0xca63b570a210d8bd022e5efe37f10aac597037081ea8b692ba47f726b4cb6993

In particular, after the police froze STFIL, a key DeFi project of FEVM, in April 2024, we actively participated in the entire incident process and communicated and interacted with Danyob and JenksGuo of the Filecoin Foundation, working together to resolve the situation and mitigate the significant negative impact of the STFIL incident on the development of the Filecoin ecosystem. By April 9, 2025, the first batch of investors had received their FIL tokens refunded, and the second batch began on August 19, 2025. This achieved significant results and greatly reassured Filecoin investors.
Check:https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/tb3Mllg5d6KXHtSID2s5Lw

In addition, actively promote the development of the Filecoin search market, such as: deeply participate in the project construction of Titan Network, and continue to promote the development of the Filecoin search market.
